title: Amazon EventBridge Scheduler to Amazon EventBridge
description: Use EventBridge Scheduler to publish an EventBridge event every 5 minutes using templated targets

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This project uses Terraform to create an Schedule that sends custom events to EventBridge that are matched to rules and use CloudWatch as a target to visualize the event pattern matches. The Terraform creates a schedule, EventBridge bus and rules as well as the IAM resources required for Scheduler to interact with EventBridge and CloudWatch.
This pattern uses templated targets to interact with EventBridge directly.
